10
11#include "vpx_config.h"
12#include "vp8_rtcd.h"
13#include "vpx_mem/vpx_mem.h"
14
15void vp8_dequant_idct_add_y_block_c(short *q, short *dq, unsigned char *dst,
16 int stride, char *eobs) {
17 int i, j;
18
19 for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
20 for (j = 0; j < 4; ++j) {
21 if (*eobs++ > 1) {
22 vp8_dequant_idct_add_c(q, dq, dst, stride);
23 } else {
24 vp8_dc_only_idct_add_c(q[0] * dq[0], dst, stride, dst, stride);
25 memset(q, 0, 2 * sizeof(q[0]));
26 }
27
28 q += 16;
29 dst += 4;
30 }
31
32 dst += 4 * stride - 16;
33 }
34}
35
36void vp8_dequant_idct_add_uv_block_c(short *q, short *dq, unsigned char *dst_u,
37 unsigned char *dst_v, int stride,
38 char *eobs) {
39 int i, j;
40
41 for (i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
42 for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
43 if (*eobs++ > 1) {
44 vp8_dequant_idct_add_c(q, dq, dst_u, stride);
45 } else {
46 vp8_dc_only_idct_add_c(q[0] * dq[0], dst_u, stride, dst_u, stride);
47 memset(q, 0, 2 * sizeof(q[0]));
48 }
49
50 q += 16;
51 dst_u += 4;
52 }
53
54 dst_u += 4 * stride - 8;
55 }
56
57 for (i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
58 for (j = 0; j < 2; ++j) {
59 if (*eobs++ > 1) {
60 vp8_dequant_idct_add_c(q, dq, dst_v, stride);
61 } else {
62 vp8_dc_only_idct_add_c(q[0] * dq[0], dst_v, stride, dst_v, stride);
63 memset(q, 0, 2 * sizeof(q[0]));
64 }
65
66 q += 16;
67 dst_v += 4;
68 }
69
70 dst_v += 4 * stride - 8;
71 }
72}
73
